title: Confidentiality of records
context: ยง560:5-307 Confidentiality of records. The written report of a kokua kanawai and any professional evaluation are confidential and shall be sealed upon filing, but are available to: (1) The court; (2) The respondent without limitation as to use; (3) The petitioner, the kokua kanawai, any nominated guardian, and the petitioner&rsquo;s, nominated guardian&rsquo;s, and respondent&rsquo;s lawyers, for purposes of the proceeding; and (4) Other persons for any purposes that the court may order for good cause. [L 2004, c 161, pt of ยง1; am L 2008, c 39, ยง4] Rules of Court Confidentiality of records, see HPR rule 113.1.
